attributes.action: allow all Gurkhas to have the right to settle here.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In honour of the the consistently outstanding service and gallantry of those serving with the Gurkhas’ Brigade we request that all Gurkha soldiers and their families should be allowed to settle here.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
